import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Create a funding source"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/funding-sources/new"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Creates a single funding source record for budgeting and allocation tracking, returning the created resource with its assigned identifier and calculated balances.

**Prerequisites**
1. **Type/Status/Site/Product IDs** - Use [POST /api/v1.0/funding-sources/query](/docs/api/funding-sources/search-funding-sources) to review existing records and reuse `FundingSourceTypeId`, `FundingSourceStatusTypeId`, `SiteId`, and `ProductId` values that are valid for your tenant.

**Workflow Example**
1. Review existing funding sources to capture valid type/status/site/product IDs.
2. Build the payload with name, allocation amount, and optional dates.
3. [POST /api/v1.0/funding-sources/new](/docs/api/funding-sources/create-funding-source) to create the funding source.

**Minimal Required Fields**: `Name`, `FundingSourceTypeId`, `FundingSourceStatusTypeId`, `SiteId` (and any tenant-required fields such as `ProductId`).

**Note**: This API is deprecated.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"Funding source to create","required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request payload for creating or updating a funding source.","properties":{"FundingSourceId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier (required for updates, optional for creates)."},"FundingSourceTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"UUID of the funding source type."},"FundingSourceStatusTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"UUID of the funding source status type."},"SiteId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"UUID of the site this funding source belongs to."},"ProductId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"UUID of the product associated with this funding source."},"Name":{"type":"string","description":"Display name of the funding source."},"Description":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Detailed description of the funding source."},"AmountAllocated":{"type":"number","format":"decimal","description":"Total budget amount allocated."},"AmountUsed":{"type":"number","format":"decimal","description":"Amount spent from this funding source."},"AmountRemaining":{"type":"number","format":"decimal","description":"Remaining balance available."},"StartDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","nullable":true,"description":"Start date of the budget period."},"EndDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","nullable":true,"description":"End date of the budget period."}},"title":"UpdateFundingSourceRequest"},"example":{"FundingSourceTypeId":"b2c3d4e5-f6a7-8901-bcde-f12345678901","FundingSourceStatusTypeId":"c3d4e5f6-a7b8-9012-cdef-123456789012","SiteId":"bb6cece8-e4f4-e511-a789-005056bb000e","ProductId":"d4e5f6a7-b8c9-0123-def0-234567890123","Name":"ESSER III Technology Fund","Description":"Federal COVID relief funds for educational technology","AmountAllocated":500000,"StartDate":"2024-07-01T00:00:00Z","EndDate":"2026-09-30T00:00:00Z"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
